channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023090056
item.description:
Report X-2023090056

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: TAYLOR
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: EMPLOYEE DISCOVEWRED LEAKING PACKAGE AND REPORTED IT TO SUPERVISIOR TO GET A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. RESPONDER RESPONDED AND PROCESSED PACKAGE THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023081706
item.description:
Report X-2023081706

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found to be wet when unloading from a trailer and brought to QA. DescribePack: The bottles were packed upside-down in the box causing the bottle to leak through the caps. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: The bottle were places right side up and caps tightened to stop the leak.

item.title: Report X-2023081698
item.description:
Report X-2023081698

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LEAKING PAIL WAS DISCOVERED DURING THE LOADING PROCESS, THEN PUT IN A HAZMAT TOTE AND BROUGHT OVER FOR INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND TO BE A DAMAGED HAZMAT AND THE HAZMAT PROCESS WAS STARTED. DescribePack: A DENT IN THE LID / TOP OF THE BUCKETT CAUSED THE LID TO POP UP BREAKING THE SEAL ALLOWING THE PRODUCT TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: BUCKET WAS TURNED RIGHT SIDE UP.

item.title: Report X-2023081696
item.description:
Report X-2023081696

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: GAYLORD
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found on truck 81920 package handlers loaded it on to the belt. The inbound scanner noticed the hazmat was wet and possibly leaking. They pulled it off the belt after scanning it. Then notified QA of the possible leaking hazmat. QA inspected at 6 am and noticed it was damaged. DescribePack: none DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: the package was placed in a hazmat tote and placed outside

item.title: Report E-2023090470
item.description:
Report E-2023090470

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-19
  • City: WHITMORE LAKE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one case of nano strip (un3093) damaging 2 if the inner poly 1 gallon cans, releasing 2 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023081234
item.description:
Report X-2023081234

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found to be leaking by the CSP Driver while on route. When driver came back to the building, he notified QA about the leaking hazmat. QA then placed the damaged hazmat in a red hazmat tote to transport it to the hazmat cage for further inspection. Upon closer inspection, it was determined that the inner plastic container had a small puncture hole on the top of it. DescribePack: There is one small puncture hole on the top of the inner plastic container. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Driver placed leaking hazmat in plastic bags to mitigate release until he got back to the station.

item.title: Report X-2023081134
item.description:
Report X-2023081134

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-12
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found during unload with liquid leaking from the cap. It was put into a hazmat tote by management who then gave it over to QA. QA took the hazmat to the hazmat cage where upon inspection it was found that the screw on cap was not properly tightened causing the spill. DescribePack: Closure improperly tightened. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon location of the leaking hazmat, it was put into a tote and taken to the hazmat cage by QA.

item.title: Report X-2023081758
item.description:
Report X-2023081758

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-31
  • City: LUDINGTON
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: OPEN BOX IN THE TRAILER THAT WAS SET ASIDE FOR TAPE UP. UPON INSPECTION THE BUCKET INSIDE HAS A YELLOW OXIDIZER 5.1 LABEL WITH UN2468. THEN CALLED THE DANGEROUS GOODS HELP DESK. ALL ITEMS TO HELD AT THE UPS CENTER UNTIL FURTHER INSTRUCTION.
